remarks: Value of the identity arrow function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
idafval.i $e |- I = ( IdA ` C ) $.
idafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
idafval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
idafval.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
idafval $p |- ( ph -> I = ( x e. B |-> <. x , x , ( .1. ` x ) >. ) ) $.
$d .1. x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d I x $.
$d ph x $.
